name: Battlefield Grab Shake
description:
Grab the battlefield and shake it up to save the world!

#GMTKJam  Battlefield Grab Shake was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Roll of the dice" so i tried to make te game where the heroes and enemies must roll out to attack each other, in order to do that the player must shake the battlefield.

Battles are resolved based on the velocity of the colliding units and their stats. When they collide with the walls they will gain more velocity, so try to always keep them moving.

Thanks for playing.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the primary click of the mouse to hold the stage, hold it down and shake it so that the units start rolling around the battlefield. Every time the units collide with each other they will deal damage based on their stats and velocity.

Between each wave you can choose which heroes to fight, unlock new ones and improve their stats. Be careful as the waves progress the enemies will get stronger too!

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY

Either install using the itch.io app or download files, unzip, open the .exe file. The game should start automatically.

KNOW ISSUES

  • it's recommended play in 1920x1080 resolution, Other resolutions may cause errors in the menu.
  • Missing text on Warrior's hability.
  • Missing sounds on buttons.

If you find a bug, please let me know below in the comments, thanks.
